benefits.title: Joint Health
benefits.description: Enhanced collagen synthesis leading to improved joint health and reduced joint pain.

benefits.title: Lean Mass Gains
benefits.description: Steady, quality muscle gains with less water retention compared to testosterone.

benefits.title: Recovery Enhancement
benefits.description: Significant improvement in recovery time and reduced muscle soreness.

benefits.title: Red Blood Cell Production
benefits.description: Increased red blood cell production leading to better endurance and performance.

sideEffects.warning: Regular blood work monitoring is crucial. Nandrolone can cause significant HPTA suppression and requires careful management.

categories.description: Possible progesterone-related side effects including gynecomastia.
Lower androgenic side effects compared to testosterone, but still possible: acne, hair loss in prone individuals.
Impact on cholesterol levels and potential cardiovascular strain.
Severe suppression of natural testosterone production, requiring extensive PCT.

protocol: Wait 3 weeks after last nandrolone decanoate injection
HCG: 1500IU EOD for 2 weeks before starting SERMs
Consider extended PCT due to long suppression

studies.title: Collagen Synthesis
studies.description: Research shows nandrolone's unique ability to enhance collagen synthesis, beneficial for joint health and injury recovery.

studies.title: Muscle Growth Mechanisms
studies.description: Studies indicate nandrolone's efficient nitrogen retention and protein synthesis capabilities, leading to quality muscle gains.
